LanguageData.GDI_Factory.label: GDI Factory
LanguageData.GDI_Factory.description: The GDI factory allows you to construct many different items, weapons and units if available.
LanguageData.GDI_Factory_Blueprint.label: GDI Factory (blueprint)
LanguageData.GDI_Factory_Frame.label: GDI Factory (building)
LanguageData.GDI_TiberiumRefinery.label: Advanced tiberium refinery
LanguageData.GDI_TiberiumRefinery.description: An advanced chemical refining plant. Used to refine lethal Tiberium into useful resources.
LanguageData.GDI_TiberiumRefinery_Blueprint.label: Advanced tiberium refinery (blueprint)
LanguageData.GDI_TiberiumRefinery_Frame.label: Advanced tiberium refinery (building)
LanguageData.GDI_TiberiumPowerPlant.label: GDI Powerplant
LanguageData.GDI_TiberiumPowerPlant.description: Produces power by consuming Tiberium fuel. Must be fueled by hand.
LanguageData.GDI_TiberiumPowerPlant_Blueprint.label: GDI Powerplant (blueprint)
LanguageData.GDI_TiberiumPowerPlant_Frame.label: GDI Powerplant (building)
